017package org.parboiled;
018
019import static imagingbook.parboiled.common.Preconditions.*;
020import org.parboiled.common.StringUtils;
021import org.parboiled.matchers.*;
022import org.parboiled.matchervisitors.MatcherVisitor;
023
024import java.util.*;
025
026public class ParserStatistics implements MatcherVisitor<ParserStatistics> {
027
028    private final Matcher root;
029    private int totalRules;
030    private final Set<AnyMatcher> anyMatchers = new HashSet<AnyMatcher>();
031    private final Set<CharIgnoreCaseMatcher> charIgnoreCaseMatchers = new HashSet<CharIgnoreCaseMatcher>();
032    private final Set<CharMatcher> charMatchers = new HashSet<CharMatcher>();
033    private final Set<CustomMatcher> customMatchers = new HashSet<CustomMatcher>();
034    private final Set<CharRangeMatcher> charRangeMatchers = new HashSet<CharRangeMatcher>();
035    private final Set<AnyOfMatcher> anyOfMatchers = new HashSet<AnyOfMatcher>();
036    private final Set<EmptyMatcher> emptyMatchers = new HashSet<EmptyMatcher>();
037    private final Set<FirstOfMatcher> firstOfMatchers = new HashSet<FirstOfMatcher>();
038    private final Set<FirstOfStringsMatcher> firstOfStringMatchers = new HashSet<FirstOfStringsMatcher>();
039    private final Set<NothingMatcher> nothingMatchers = new HashSet<NothingMatcher>();
040    private final Set<OneOrMoreMatcher> oneOrMoreMatchers = new HashSet<OneOrMoreMatcher>();
041    private final Set<OptionalMatcher> optionalMatchers = new HashSet<OptionalMatcher>();
042    private final Set<SequenceMatcher> sequenceMatchers = new HashSet<SequenceMatcher>();
043    private final Set<StringMatcher> stringMatchers = new HashSet<StringMatcher>();
044    private final Set<TestMatcher> testMatchers = new HashSet<TestMatcher>();
045    private final Set<TestNotMatcher> testNotMatchers = new HashSet<TestNotMatcher>();
046    private final Set<ZeroOrMoreMatcher> zeroOrMoreMatchers = new HashSet<ZeroOrMoreMatcher>();
047
048    private final Set<Action> actions = new HashSet<Action>();
049    private final Set<Class<?>> actionClasses = new HashSet<Class<?>>();
050    private final Set<ProxyMatcher> proxyMatchers = new HashSet<ProxyMatcher>();
051    private final Set<VarFramingMatcher> varFramingMatchers = new HashSet<VarFramingMatcher>();
052    private final Set<MemoMismatchesMatcher> memoMismatchesMatchers = new HashSet<MemoMismatchesMatcher>();
053
054    @SuppressWarnings({"unchecked"})
055    public static ParserStatistics generateFor(Rule rule) {
056        checkArgNotNull(rule, "rule");
057        Matcher matcher = (Matcher) rule;
058        return matcher.accept(new ParserStatistics(matcher));
059    }
060
061    private ParserStatistics(Matcher root) {
062        this.root = root;
063        countSpecials(root);
064    }
065
066    public Rule getRootRule() {
067        return root;
068    }
069
070    public int getTotalRules() {
071        return totalRules;
072    }
073
074    public Set<AnyMatcher> getAnyMatchers() {
075        return anyMatchers;
076    }
077
078    public Set<CharIgnoreCaseMatcher> getCharIgnoreCaseMatchers() {
079        return charIgnoreCaseMatchers;
080    }
081
082    public Set<CharMatcher> getCharMatchers() {
083        return charMatchers;
084    }
085
086    public Set<CustomMatcher> getCustomMatchers() {
087        return customMatchers;
088    }
089
090    public Set<CharRangeMatcher> getCharRangeMatchers() {
091        return charRangeMatchers;
092    }
093
094    public Set<AnyOfMatcher> getAnyOfMatchers() {
095        return anyOfMatchers;
096    }
097
098    public Set<EmptyMatcher> getEmptyMatchers() {
099        return emptyMatchers;
100    }
101
102    public Set<FirstOfMatcher> getFirstOfMatchers() {
103        return firstOfMatchers;
104    }
105
106    public Set<FirstOfStringsMatcher> getFirstOfStringMatchers() {
107        return firstOfStringMatchers;
108    }
109
110    public Set<MemoMismatchesMatcher> getMemoMismatchesMatchers() {
111        return memoMismatchesMatchers;
112    }
113
114    public Set<NothingMatcher> getNothingMatchers() {
115        return nothingMatchers;
116    }
117
118    public Set<OneOrMoreMatcher> getOneOrMoreMatchers() {
119        return oneOrMoreMatchers;
120    }
121
122    public Set<OptionalMatcher> getOptionalMatchers() {
123        return optionalMatchers;
124    }
125
126    public Set<SequenceMatcher> getSequenceMatchers() {
127        return sequenceMatchers;
128    }
129
130    public Set<StringMatcher> getStringMatchers() {
131        return stringMatchers;
132    }
133
134    public Set<TestMatcher> getTestMatchers() {
135        return testMatchers;
136    }
137
138    public Set<TestNotMatcher> getTestNotMatchers() {
139        return testNotMatchers;
140    }
141
142    public Set<ZeroOrMoreMatcher> getZeroOrMoreMatchers() {
143        return zeroOrMoreMatchers;
144    }
145
146    public Set<Action> getActions() {
147        return actions;
148    }
149
150    public Set<Class<?>> getActionClasses() {
151        return actionClasses;
152    }
153
154    public Set<ProxyMatcher> getProxyMatchers() {
155        return proxyMatchers;
156    }
157
158    public Set<VarFramingMatcher> getVarFramingMatchers() {
159        return varFramingMatchers;
160    }
161
162    // MatcherVisitor interface
163
164    public ParserStatistics visit(ActionMatcher matcher) {
165        if (!actions.contains(matcher.action)) {
166            totalRules++;
167            actions.add(matcher.action);
168            actionClasses.add(matcher.action.getClass());
169        }
170        return this;
171    }
172
173    public ParserStatistics visit(AnyMatcher matcher) {
174        return visit(matcher, anyMatchers);
175    }
176
177    public ParserStatistics visit(CharIgnoreCaseMatcher matcher) {
178        return visit(matcher, charIgnoreCaseMatchers);
179    }
180
181    public ParserStatistics visit(CharMatcher matcher) {
182        return visit(matcher, charMatchers);
183    }
184
185    public ParserStatistics visit(CustomMatcher matcher) {
186        return visit(matcher, customMatchers);
187    }
188
189    public ParserStatistics visit(CharRangeMatcher matcher) {
190        return visit(matcher, charRangeMatchers);
191    }
192
193    public ParserStatistics visit(AnyOfMatcher matcher) {
194        return visit(matcher, anyOfMatchers);
195    }
196
197    public ParserStatistics visit(EmptyMatcher matcher) {
198        return visit(matcher, emptyMatchers);
199    }
200
201    public ParserStatistics visit(FirstOfMatcher matcher) {
202        return matcher instanceof FirstOfStringsMatcher ?
203                visit((FirstOfStringsMatcher)matcher, firstOfStringMatchers) :
204                visit(matcher, firstOfMatchers);
205    }
206
207    public ParserStatistics visit(NothingMatcher matcher) {
208        return visit(matcher, nothingMatchers);
209    }
210
211    public ParserStatistics visit(OneOrMoreMatcher matcher) {
212        return visit(matcher, oneOrMoreMatchers);
213    }
214
215    public ParserStatistics visit(OptionalMatcher matcher) {
216        return visit(matcher, optionalMatchers);
217    }
218
219    public ParserStatistics visit(SequenceMatcher matcher) {
220        return matcher instanceof StringMatcher ?
221                visit((StringMatcher)matcher, stringMatchers) :
222                visit(matcher, sequenceMatchers);
223    }
224
225    public ParserStatistics visit(TestMatcher matcher) {
226        return visit(matcher, testMatchers);
227    }
228
229    public ParserStatistics visit(TestNotMatcher matcher) {
230        return visit(matcher, testNotMatchers);
231    }
232
233    public ParserStatistics visit(ZeroOrMoreMatcher matcher) {
234        return visit(matcher, zeroOrMoreMatchers);
235    }
236
237    private <M extends Matcher> ParserStatistics visit(M matcher, Set<M> set) {
238        if (!set.contains(matcher)) {
239            totalRules++;
240            set.add(matcher);
241            for (Matcher child : matcher.getChildren()) {
242                countSpecials(child);
243                child.accept(this);
244            }
245        }
246        return this;
247    }
248
249    private void countSpecials(Matcher matcher) {
250        if (matcher instanceof ProxyMatcher) {
251            proxyMatchers.add((ProxyMatcher) matcher);
252        } else if (matcher instanceof VarFramingMatcher) {
253            varFramingMatchers.add((VarFramingMatcher) matcher);
254        } else if (matcher instanceof MemoMismatchesMatcher) {
255            memoMismatchesMatchers.add((MemoMismatchesMatcher) matcher);
256        }
257    }
258
259    @Override
260    public String toString() {
261        return new StringBuilder("Parser statistics for rule '").append(root).append("':\n")
262                .append("    Total rules       : ").append(totalRules).append('\n')
263                .append("        Actions       : ").append(actions.size()).append('\n')
264                .append("        Any           : ").append(anyMatchers.size()).append('\n')
265                .append("        CharIgnoreCase: ").append(charIgnoreCaseMatchers.size()).append('\n')
266                .append("        Char          : ").append(charMatchers.size()).append('\n')
267                .append("        Custom        : ").append(customMatchers.size()).append('\n')
268                .append("        CharRange     : ").append(charRangeMatchers.size()).append('\n')
269                .append("        AnyOf         : ").append(anyOfMatchers.size()).append('\n')
270                .append("        Empty         : ").append(emptyMatchers.size()).append('\n')
271                .append("        FirstOf       : ").append(firstOfMatchers.size()).append('\n')
272                .append("        FirstOfStrings: ").append(firstOfStringMatchers.size()).append('\n')
273                .append("        Nothing       : ").append(nothingMatchers.size()).append('\n')
274                .append("        OneOrMore     : ").append(oneOrMoreMatchers.size()).append('\n')
275                .append("        Optional      : ").append(optionalMatchers.size()).append('\n')
276                .append("        Sequence      : ").append(sequenceMatchers.size()).append('\n')
277                .append("        String        : ").append(stringMatchers.size()).append('\n')
278                .append("        Test          : ").append(testMatchers.size()).append('\n')
279                .append("        TestNot       : ").append(testNotMatchers.size()).append('\n')
280                .append("        ZeroOrMore    : ").append(zeroOrMoreMatchers.size()).append('\n')
281                .append('\n')
282                .append("    Action Classes    : ").append(actionClasses.size()).append('\n')
283                .append("    ProxyMatchers     : ").append(proxyMatchers.size()).append('\n')
284                .append("    VarFramingMatchers: ").append(varFramingMatchers.size()).append('\n')
285                .append("MemoMismatchesMatchers: ").append(memoMismatchesMatchers.size()).append('\n')
286                .toString();
287    }
288
289    public String printActionClassInstances() {
290        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder("Action classes and their instances for rule '")
291                .append(root).append("':\n");
292
293        for (String line : printActionClassLines()) {
294            sb.append("    ").append(line).append('\n');
295        }
296        return sb.toString();
297    }
298
299    private List<String> printActionClassLines() {
300        List<String> lines = new ArrayList<String>();
301        int anonymous = 0;
302        for (Class<?> actionClass : actionClasses) {
303            String name = actionClass.getSimpleName();
304            if (StringUtils.isEmpty(name)) {
305                anonymous++;
306            } else {
307                lines.add(name + " : " + StringUtils.join(printActionClassInstances(actionClass), ", "));
308            }
309        }
310        Collections.sort(lines);
311        if (anonymous > 0) lines.add("and " + anonymous + " anonymous instance(s)");
312        return lines;
313    }
314
315    private List<String> printActionClassInstances(Class<?> actionClass) {
316        List<String> actionNames = new ArrayList<String>();
317        for (Action action : actions) {
318            if (action.getClass().equals(actionClass)) {
319                actionNames.add(action.toString());
320            }
321        }
322        Collections.sort(actionNames);
323        return actionNames;
324    }
325
326}
